text: Lalbihari Bhattacharya (1937/38 – 15 August 2019) was an Indian politician. He was elected as MLA of Barjora Vidhan Sabha Constituency in West Bengal Legislative Assembly in 1982. He died on 15 August 2019 at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1930s births Category:2019 deaths Category:Communist Party of India (Marxist) politicians Category:West Bengal MLAs 1982–1987
title: Lalbihari Bhattacharya
